
### POSIX process management  {.smaller}


* essential operations:
<hr class="vspace" />
* process information: <code>getpid</code>
* process creation: <code>fork</code>
* running programs: <code>exec*</code>

* waiting for processes to finish: <code>waitpid</code> [ (or <code>wait</code>)]{.my-small}
* process destruction, ‘signaling’: <code>exit</code>, <code>kill</code>
